DOC.brief_summary: A study comparing the topical application of Aczone® plus Differin® versus Duac® plus Differin® in patients with severe facial acne (facial acne vulgaris).
DOC.brief_title: A Study Comparing Aczone® Plus Differin® Versus Duac® Plus Differin® in Patients With Severe Facial Acne
DOC.criteria: Severe facial acne (acne vulgaris) History of significant anemia or hemolysis History of enteritis (eg, regional enteritis, ulcerative colitis, pseudomembranous colitis, antibioticassociated colitis) History of lupus, rosacea, or seborrheic dermatitis
